1596220.name: Tales of Arcrath
1596220.description:
Arcrath is a 2D JRPG series that pertains to historical eras such as Dark Ages, Ancient Rome, Feudal Japan etc...

The game consists of many features; however, the main functions are as follows

20+ hours - Live your life in a World of Philosophy and Poetry

* Government: There is a government feature where the player manages towns such as shop development, taxes, commerce, food safety etc...

* Field Warfare: There is a Field Warfare aspect integrated in with the traditional Side View Battle System whereas the town may get attacked by rebels.

* Naval Warfare: Sink pirate ships or merchants

* Multiple Parties: Player takes control of multiple parties pertaining to the current House they are playing as

* Simulation: The game has an AI to manage the town, Towns have their own Data such as population, coin, food and resources providing a simulator game experience.

and much more...

Disclosure
AI is used for the background images in the game

I use it as a tool to assist in setting the tone/atmosphere of scenes
